channel.title: NPC spawning error
channel.description:
Whenever I add a new Silabs monster I get this when i run my server. Then i cant log into the server. How can I add them?
I tried spawning NPCid 4980 which is brutal green dragon. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Array IndexOutOfBoundsException: 4980 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:1382) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1132) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:428) at server.main(server.java:97)[/code]
I'm using a Devolution(Dodian) base server. Silabs.

item.title: NPC spawning error
item.dc:creator: @bloodymouth bloodymouth
item.description:
@bloodymouth wrote:

No I’m not. Thats the problem. I don’t know how to make it handle it.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC spawning error
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

ok well thats good but it seems like you are having an array error. are you sure your servers array is set to handle an npc at the id of 4980?

Read full topic

item.title: NPC spawning error
item.dc:creator: @bug bug
item.description:
@bug wrote:

when adding that monster, did you use spaces in the .cfg or did you use tabs, because only tabs will work when spacing apart. otherwise errors occur

Read full topic
